text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump keeps committing crimes and the @GOP keeps looking the other way. Trump, and the GOP, ignored covid-19 and let it spread widely in the USA without any testing. People are dying because the GOP is NOT competent. Speaker Pelosi is doing her job. Why aren't you?
